attributes.action: require the Chancellor to stand on one leg when making his budget speech
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will ensure that all tax legislation is kept simple. The filling in of a tax return is too complicated for the "ordinary person". Taxation is far too taxing! We all have too much other stuff to do to be doing with all this.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
